headline: Meta Hires Two Key Apple AI Experts After Poaching Their Boss

headline: Former Heads of Google Travel and Tripadvisor Form AI Startup to Head Off Online Travel Agencies
summary: The idea of hotels partnering with ex-Googlers and DirectBooking trying to undercut OTA-like Tripadvisor's relationships with LLMs is not without its ironies. Still, the concept of hotels working more closely with LLMs and bypassing OTAs is one that could gain traction.

headline: BMO Capital Reiterates Outperform on Alphabet (GOOGL), Raises Price Target to $208
summary: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is one of the AI Stocks Gaining Attention on Wall Street. On July 14, BMO Capital analyst Brian Pitz raised the price target on the stock to $208.00 (from $200.00) while maintaining an “Outperform” rating. The firm expressed optimism that Google’s AI products, particularly PMax and Gemini, will increase spending from existing advertisers. […]

headline: DoD Awards $800M in AI Contracts to OpenAI, Google, Anthropic, xAI for National Security
summary: Alphabet Inc. (NASDAQ:GOOGL) is one of the best US stocks to buy according to Billionaires.
